title: New Releases and More for May 1, 2018
description:
This week, Liberty and Amanda discuss What You Want To See, A Lucky Man, The Electric Woman, and more great books.
This episode was sponsored by Reading Women, Warby Parker, and The Black Witch by Laurie Forest.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or iTunes and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
For a complete list of books discussed in this episode, visit our website.

Books discussed on the show:
What You Want to See by Kristen Lepionka
The Electric Woman: A Memoir in Death-Defying Acts by Tessa Fontaine
The Lonely Witness by William Boyle
Song of Blood & Stone: Earthsinger Chronicles, Book One by L. Penelope
Mr. Flood’s Last Resort by Jess Kidd
The Very Worst Missionary: A Memoir or Whatever by Jamie Wright
A Lucky Man: Stories by Jamel Brinkley
Heavy Vinyl by Carly Usdin, Nina Vakueva (Illustrator)

What we’re reading this week:
The Leper Spy: The Story of an Unlikely Hero of World War II by Ben Montgomery
East of Eden by John Steinbeck
The Dreamers by Karen Thompson Walker
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
